entities.description: A supplementary section of the document.
A term referring to combined data on various drugs.
Category or type of drug specified in the tables.
Tables that specify types of drugs under the consolidated category.

relationships.description: Indicates that the document includes an appendix section.
Shows that the appendix contains consolidated data on drugs.
Refers to specific categories or types of drugs in the tables.
Specifies the types of drugs categorized in the tables.
